relation: Lenovo DisplayPort to VGA Monitor Cable
textBeforeTable: http://www.lenovo.com/accessoriesguide For more information on options, including compatibility, go to: http://www.lenovo.com/support/monitoraccessories   No software required DisplayPort plug and VGA analog receptacle connectors 20-cm (7.8 in) cable length 1920 x 1200 WUXGA maximum resolution Support for  attaching a VGA analog monitor The DisplayPort to VGA Monitor Cable lets you easily connect a VGA analog monitor to a DisplayPort source device.
